headline: INFICON DEPOSITION CONTROLLER
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Deposition Equipment > Other Physical Vapor Deposition Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Inficon
Model IC/4
Description Deposition Controller
Accessories All accessories are optional (not included)- click on extended description link

To perform measurements at least one oscillator, sensor module, feedthrough and cables are required

Other Information Third party software is available on Internet, for example you can upload layers information
through serial port with CRYSTAL: http://www.ftgsoftware.com/crystal.htm
You can write your own software with BASIC also, command set is described in the manual, click here for download

Extended Description Details at Inficon IC4 Deposition Controller.pdf
Power Requirements 120/240 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 18.500 in (47.0 cm)
Height 5.000 in (12.7 cm)
Weight 24 lb (11 kg)
